title:
Uncertainty Modeling in Graph Neural Networks via Stochastic
  Differential Equations
authors:
Richard Bergna, Sergio Calvo-Ordo\~nez, Felix L. Opolka, Pietro Li\`o,
  Jose Miguel Hernandez-Lobato
abstract:
We address the problem of learning uncertainty-aware representations for
graph-structured data. While Graph Neural Ordinary Differential Equations
(GNODE) are effective in learning node representations, they fail to quantify
uncertainty. To address this, we introduce Latent Graph Neural Stochastic
Differential Equations (LGNSDE), which enhance GNODE by embedding randomness
through Brownian motion to quantify uncertainty. We provide theoretical
guarantees for LGNSDE and empirically show better performance in uncertainty
quantification.
